version_description:
+ Various under-the-hood optimisations and bug fixes
+ New option to Tweet us your feedback! Find it under the Settings tab in iFont

+ Various under-the-hood optimisations and bug fixes
+ New option to Tweet us your feedback! Find it under the Settings tab in iFont

+ Various under-the-hood optimisations and bug fixes

+ Various under-the-hood optimisations and bug fixes
+ New option to Tweet us your feedback! Find it under the Settings tab in iFont
+ Remove adverts and enable an exciting new blue theme with an in-app purchase
+ Remove adverts and enable an exciting new blue theme with an in-app purchase
+ Remove adverts and enable an exciting new blue theme with an in-app purchase
+ Remove adverts and enable an exciting new blue theme with an in-app purchase

+ Install multiple font families in one profile with the handy new 'Bulk Install' option
+ Fixed an issue that prevented files containing spaces being imported successfully into iFont (sorry about that…)
+ Fixed an issue that prevented files from being exported from iFont (sorry about that one too…)

+ Install multiple font families in one profile with the handy new 'Bulk Install' option

+ Fixed an issue that prevented files from being exported from iFont (sorry about that one too…)

+ Fixed an issue that prevented files containing spaces being imported successfully into iFont (sorry about that…)
+ Fixed an issue that prevented files from being exported from iFont (sorry about that one too…)
- New and simplified user guide (access it via the 'Help' button under the User Fonts tab)
